# Mama Fern
> Grounded family apparel for crunchy, cozy homes. Natural fabrics and earthy 
> designs for moms, dads, and kids.

## About
Mama Fern is a family apparel brand based in the United States, specializing in 
natural-fabric clothing for families who value comfort, sustainability, and earthy aesthetics. 
Our products include matching family sets, kids' clothing, and parent apparel designed 
for outdoor-loving, crunchy, cottagecore-inspired families.

## Products
- Mama Fern Classic Tee — Women's organic cotton tee ($32)
- Mama Fern Rooted Crewneck — Women's sweatshirt ($52)
- Mama Fern Wildflower Tee — Women's botanical print tee ($34)
- Papa Fern Classic Tee — Men's/unisex organic cotton tee ($32)
- Papa Fern Rooted Crewneck — Men's/unisex sweatshirt ($52)
- Little Fern Sprout Tee — Kids tee, sizes 2T-8Y ($22)
- Little Fern Seedling Onesie — Baby bodysuit, 0-18M ($24)
- Little Fern Nature Explorer Tee — Kids tee, sizes 2T-8Y ($22)
- Mama Fern Canvas Tote — Organic cotton tote bag ($22)
- Mama Fern Cozy Beanie — Organic cotton knit beanie ($20)

## Gift Bundles
- The Mama Bundle — Tee + tote ($52)
- The Family Set — Mom tee + dad tee + onesie ($98)
- The New Mama Gift — Mom tee + onesie + gift wrap ($54)
- The Mini Match — Mom tee + kids tee ($52)

## Key Facts
- Founded: 2024
- Location: United States
- Fabrics: Organic cotton, linen, bamboo viscose
- Certifications: GOTS, OEKO-TEX Standard 100 Class I
- Price range: Under $30 to under $100
- Shipping: United States (international coming soon)
- Returns: 30-day hassle-free returns

## Contact
- Website: https://mamafern.com
- Support: https://mamafern.com/contact
